I can't honestly recommend this game anymore. After playing for many hours, unless you pay for a third party anticheat like esea or faceit. This game is nearly unplayable in official matchmaking. It is absolutely plagued with hackers and lacks a sufficient anticheat. For this size of company, they could afford to implement a functional anticheat like valorant, yet choose not to do so and instead keep releasing new skins which add nothing to the competitive value of the game. Second, for some reason the official matchmaking runs at a separate tickrate than competitive tournaments making smoke grenade lineups for jump throws different and you have to learn separate lineups if you plan to play the game competitively. At its core, this game is great but is ruined by lack of support by the developers.
